title: Production Implementation Automation
shortDescription: Automated the production deployment of State Farm's policy management system
longDescription: I automated the production deployment by orchestrating various implementation tools including Jenkins, Urban Code Deploy, and internal tools using Python, Groovy, and shell scripts.

title: Jenkins Scripts
shortDescription: Collection of reusable classes and steps to drastically reduce code maintenance
longDescription: By creating more reusable classes, pipeline steps, and scripts I was able to drastically reduce the number of pipelines my team had to maintain from over 300 to fewer than 30

title: GitLab Metrics Collection
shortDescription: Small Node.js web service that runs a cron job to scrape metrics from GitLab's API
longDescription: Contributed to a inner source project to create a small Node.js application running on Kubernetes that would run a cron job to scrape custom metrics from GitLab to be collected by Prometheus and displayed on a Grafana dashboard

title: Pipeline Rerun Automation
shortDescription: Kubernetes cron job to rerun CI on stale merge requests
longDescription: Node.js script that used GitLab's web API to determine old merge requests with passing CI in order to rerun Jenkins CI and prevent stale merge requests from breaking the build

title: BDD Test Steps Search
shortDescription: Easily search through Gherkin steps and drag and drop to build your test case
longDescription: Single page React app that allowed users to easily search through Gherkin tags with fuzzy matching and weighted inverted index search

title: CLI Month Calendar
longDescription: CLI in Golang that prints a monthly calendar

title: Simple Neural Network
longDescription: Hand written number recognition from scratch to better understand how neural networks work and learn a little bit of Clojure

title: Allocator Budget App
shortDescription: Chance to have fun learning more about Svelte and Firebase
longDescription: I was curious to test out Firebase as well as continue to learn more about Svelte so I implemented a basic application to use the main features of Firebase

title: My Resume
shortDescription: This website you're looking at right now!
longDescription: I built this website using Svelte.js  end with lots of HTML and CSS. The data is stored in JSON files. It's deployed using Surge.sh and the codebase is stored on GitHub.
